queries.query: INSERT INTO `{PREFIX}settings` (`group_id`, `label`, `name`, `field`, `value`, `is_hidden`, `version_id`, `type_id`, `value_actual`, `value_default`, `description`, `ordering`, `is_boot`) VALUES ((SELECT `id` FROM `{PREFIX}setting_groups` WHERE `module_id` = 'Reminder'), 'Reminder user role', 'reminder_role', NULL, '', 0, NULL, 'text', '', '', 'Reminder user role', 18, 0);
